title: Problem Patching League of Legends
body: I have tried to open both the alpha client for live and the legacy client and both of them immediately tell me that there was a problem patching lol and closes out the client; is there a solution to this?

replies.body: If this is happening as soon as you select the LoL icon, then there might be a security setting blocking your game files from being scanned.  If the patcher can't get to the game files then it can't check or apply updates.  Go over the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to help get this fixed up.  Let me know if that helps!
